result.title: Python 3 RUNTIME ERROR
result.content:
I tried to upload a source in Python but I got it:

Time: 30 ms, memory: 0 KB Verdict: RUNTIME_ERROR

Code:

numbers = int(input())

a = []
b = []

for i in range(0, numbers):
    a.append(int(input()))

for i in range(1, numbers):
    b.append(a[i - 1] + a[i])

b.append(a[numbers - 1])
print(b)
